author: Staff Reporter
text:
A press release from Division 4, Electricity Department, has asked consumers in Villianur, Sulthanpet, Reddiarpalayam, Boomianpet, Pakkumdaiyampet, Kurunji Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Lawspet, Muthirapalayam, Ananda Nagar, Gorimedu, Kalapet, Kanagachettikulam, Pillaichavady, Sanjeevi Nagar, Pathukkanu, Thondamatham, Sedarapet, Karasur, Thirukkanur, Koonichempet, Manalipet, Katterikuppam, Suthukeny and surrounding areas to pay the consumption charges on or before the due date as stipulated in their electricity bills.

Disconnection

In case of disconnection, consumers have been asked to clear the arrears before power supply can be restored.
title: ‘Clear electricity bill arrears’
